sense.def:
Kdor je
unbalanced
, je nekoliko nor.

seg.quote: The strain of the past few days has made you mentally unbalanced.

sense.def:
Kadar je opis nečesa
unbalanced
, je nepošten ali netočen, ker poudarja nekatere stvari, drugih pa sploh ne omenja.

seg.quote: She complained that the magazine had published an unbalanced report.
